content:
Scenario: School supply and activity assistance for children's participation
    Given Maria struggles to afford school supplies, field trips, and activities
    And she wants her children to participate fully despite budget constraints
    When school-related expenses arise
    Then the community_elohim should connect Maria to school assistance programs
    And support should enable her children's full educational participation
    And assistance should be provided without stigmatizing her family
    And children should not be excluded from opportunities due to single-parent economics
    And Maria should be able to provide for her children's education with community support
